r.s: A Memcache-MySQL-based session handler for Zend Framework (1)
r.d: Lagged_Session_SaveHandler_Memcache is a session handler for the Zend Framework (1) which supports: * Memcached (via ext/memcache) as a primary backend * MySQL (via ext/mysqli with mysqlnd) for backup
r.n: Refactored MySQL usage inside the objects to avoid premature connecting to the mysqld.
